body.body: Odometer Reading in Miles (Km) or Time Period, whichever comes first
Engine and oil cooler - check for leaks
Autoscan - Carry out a full Autoscan using the Triumph Diagnostic Tool (print a customer copy)
Fuel system - check hoses for chafing, cracks or damage
Every four years, regardless of mileage
Every four years, regardless of mileage
Cooling system - check hoses for chafing, cracks or damage. Replace hoses if necessary
Clutch cable - check function and adjust as necessary
Rear wheel needle roller bearing - lubricate
Wheel bearings - check for wear/smooth operation
All lights, instruments and electrical systems - check
Front and rear suspension - check for leaks/smooth operation
Brake master cylinders - check for fluid leaks
Brake calipers - check for fluid leaks and seized pistons
ABS and immobiliser ECMs - check for stored DTCs
Engine ECM - check for latest calibration download using the Triumph diagnostic tool
Bank angle indicators - inspect visually for wear
Carry out all outstanding Service Bulletin and warranty work
Complete the service record book and reset the service indicator

title: Scheduled Maintenance Chart
